thread.title: VOTE: Should Eagles bench Sam Bradford, go to Mark Sanchez? (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: VOTE: Should Eagles bench Sam Bradford, go to Mark Sanchez? (VIDEO)

author: Eliot Shorr-Parks | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: VOTE: Should Eagles bench Sam Bradford, go to Mark Sanchez? (VIDEO)
text:
PHILADELPHIA -- Things aren't going to plan so far for the Eagles . 
So is it time for a new one? 
Eagles quarterback Sam Bradford has two interceptions in the first half of the team's game against the New Orleans Saints, and the result is a 7-7 tie as of midway through the second quarter in a game the Eagles have been dominating at times. 
Overall, Bradford is 13 of 18 for 160 yards two interceptions and an interception, but needless to say, the two picks were costly. 
Is it time to go to Mark Sanchez? At 1-3, a loss would doom the Eagles' season. 
Check out the interceptions below, then vote in the poll -- should head coach Chip Kelly yank Bradford? @_MisfitChris RT @PJbleedsgreen : Sam Bradford. Underthrows Cooper by 3-4 yards who is essentially open for a fade. pic.twitter.com/dd0nx0dLTp — Angela Rockford (@angie_goodwood) October 11, 2015 Bradford 2nd pick ONCE AGAIN, Sam Bradford all day in the pocket, underthrows an open WR. Second INT in RZ today. pic.twitter.com/8QqzxeidBK — Sam Trashford (@PJbleedsgreen) October 11, 2015
